@title PvPRegistry
 @notice Manages PvP game pools, funding, and settlement.

@notice Create a new PvP Game (Table).
 @notice Transfers 5 USDC from creator to this contract.
@notice Emergency Withdraw in case of stuck funds (Only Owner).

@title ScoreRegistry
 @notice Immutable registry for game scores coupled with protocol fee payment.
